rows.label: bf08520100_0025
rows.name: Now Metsu just needs to activate Aion.

rows.label: bf08520100_0030
rows.name: If we can hold this position and prevent them from advancing upward until then...

rows.label: bf08520100_0042
rows.name: Then we better give it our all.

rows.label: bf08520100_0060
rows.name:
Your Holiness!
One of the amplifier towers has been...

rows.label: bf08520100_0070
rows.name:
Don't panic.
The area of effect has just narrowed slightly.

rows.label: bf08520100_0090
rows.name:
Concentrate the warrior monks to the front.
Knock down those insects.
